level.heading: Uniformity.
level.text: It is the intent of the Council of the District of Columbia that in construing this chapter, a court of competent jurisdiction may use as a guide interpretations given by federal courts to comparable antitrust statutes.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-169
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-169, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28-4501.
